mapper.sql: id, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, title, startDate, endDate, content, name, mobile, qq, userId
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_appointment
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{title} , '%')
AND startDate like CONCAT('%', #{startDate} , '%')
AND endDate like CONCAT('%', #{endDate} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{content} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND mobile like CONCAT('%', #{mobile} , '%')
AND qq like CONCAT('%', #{qq} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
